Accepted papers

  • Edge Intelligence Workshop 2025
  • edge.intelligence.workshop@gmail.com

The Edge Intelligence Workshop (EIW) will focus on distributed processing, lightweight models, energy efficiency, and security in decentralized systems. It aims to advance edge AI by addressing unique challenges, differentiating from traditional cloud-focused workshops, and fostering new research and technological contributions.
